name: ripple-lib-browser-client
description: A simple client to try ripple-lib in the browser

scripts.prepublish: git clone https://github.com/mikeb1rd/ripple-lib.git ./node_modules/ripple-lib && cd ./node_modules/ripple-lib && npm install && cd ../../ && node ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js main.js > bundle.js

author: Michael Bird
